component.name: Hello Minecraft! Launcher
component.summary: A Minecraft Launcher which is multi-functional, cross-platform and popular

description.p: HMCL is a Minecraft launcher which supports Mod management, game customizing, auto installing(Forge, LiteLoader and OptiFine), modpack creating, UI customizing and so on.
Note: install org.freedesktop.Sdk.Extension.openjdk8, if you want to run minecraft older than 1.17.
